TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContextMenuEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class ContextMenuEventArgs Inherits RoutedEventArgs
public ref class ContextMenuEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::RoutedEventArgs

Docs.summary: 为上下文菜单事件提供数据。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CursorLeft As Double
public: property double CursorLeft { double get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当用户通过右键单击鼠标打开上下文菜单时, 此属性将返回鼠标的位置。 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>通过设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementRectangle%2A>、 、、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.VerticalOffsetProperty>或属性来指定的位置不会影响的值。 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenuEventArgs.CursorLeft%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.Placement%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.PlacementTarget%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu.HorizontalOffset%2A>
当用户使用键盘打开上下文菜单时, 或当上下文菜单关闭时, 此属性的值为-1。

remarks.format:
